title: Idolls!
opening_song: "WE ARE THE ONE" by Aina (Aina Rutou) Ami (Ami Mizuno), Shiori (Shiori Hanaoka), Ruka (Ruka Yashiro)
ending_song: "Yumemite Samete mo (夢みてさめても)" by Aina (Aina Rutou) Ami (Ami Mizuno), Shiori (Shiori Hanaoka), Ruka (Ruka Yashiro)
sinopse: An idol group, consisting of four young girls, are at loss as the number of guests coming to their concerts is hilariously low. One day, confronted by a talking wooden carving, they take on a challenge to gather a hundred fans in only ten days in order to fill a proper concert venue.
